topic.title: Zero-Net Discussion Thread
topic.body: What do you think is the pourpose of the ZN? The substitution of the common net (something at this point impossible), or an alternative? If is an alternative; what space is trying to fill?

1_17d8biWB6b4QwDQ4zRHPRtZjcToMCyvjQD.body: I think this as a new kind of database, like an open net of torrenting.A new babylon library .Btw does anyone knows any place i can upload torrents ?
